text:
There was a problem in Maven when Crimson was in use with the JUnitreport task.  
A lot of output was generated in the system-out element, which crimson didn't like at 
all.  
However, having system-out as CDATA "fixed" the problem (as did changing to Xerces). 
 
Anyway, IMHO system-out and system-err are good candidates for CDATA anyway, 
patch to follow. 
  
See the thread at: 
 http://www.mail-archive.com/turbine-maven-dev@jakarta.apache.org/msg00100.html 
for more info.
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Created attachment 1613
Text -> CDATASection for formatOutput

Oh, and it would maybe be good to output CDATA instead of Text also from formatError() in  
XMLJUnitResultFormatter.
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
